scripts.build: vue-cli-service build && copyfiles -f dist/DNNSearchAndReplace-bundle.min.js ../admin/personaBar/scripts && copyfiles -f dist/DNNSearchAndReplace-bundle.min.js.map ../admin/personaBar/scripts && copyfiles -f dist/DNNSearchAndReplace-bundle.min.css ../admin/personaBar/css && copyfiles -f src/assets/*.png ../admin/personaBar/images && copyfiles -f dist/fonts/*.* ../admin/personaBar/css/fonts
